name: Starter Plan
description: Perfect for beginners who want to stay active and healthy without breaking the bank.
features: Access to gym facilities during off-peak hours

name: Pro Plan
description: Ideal for fitness enthusiasts looking for flexibility and enhanced services.
features: Access to sauna and steam rooms

name: Elite Plan
description: Designed for professionals who want an all-inclusive gym experience.
features: Unlimited gym access with VIP amenities
